General.Name: TXC Corp
General.Description: TXC Corporation engages in the research, design, development, production, and sale of crystal and oscillator products in Taiwan and internationally. The company's products include crystals, oscillators, and sensors, as well as automotive crystals. It also engages in the 5G infrastructure and device ecosystem development activities. The company's products are used in various applications, including mobile communication, information and storage device, internet of things, vehicle electronics, telecommunication equipment, smart home, AI, medical care, 5G, etc. TXC Corporation was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 16, Chung Yang South Road Peitou, Taipei, Taiwan, 112
